sense.def: Alternative Names qi chuan 氣喘 , chuan ji 喘急; chuan ni 喘逆 , panting with [qi] counterflow; shang qi 上氣 , rising qi.

① Alternative Names chuan xi 喘息. Illness Sign of rapid in- and exhalation, often accompanied by breathing difficulties. Su wen 素問 22: 肺病者，喘咳逆氣，肩背痛 , “In the case of a lung disease, one pants and coughs from qi moving contrary [to its regular course]. There is pain in the shoulders and the back”.
② Pathological Condition resulting from all types of causes with panting. Su wen 素問 19: 其不及則令人喘 , “If it is inadequate, this makes a person pant ”.
